column5: SLCA Move down is institutions stealing shares from each other Selling hard to profit from leveraged derivitives and eventually buying back cheaper Possible when producer price index is down and stock trading below trendlines I will be worried when SCLA is not mostly owned by institutions and insiders Wait two Quarters this is the most efficient sand provider and a sure survivor of the industry shakeout
SLCA short interest ratio is 818 on 20190515 and Short to float is 1809 sunshineavenuecomstock via sunshineave
